backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining data types (Subject, Note, Flashcard, Exam, StudySession, DayProgress) and public functions for managing daily timetables, notes, flashcards, and exam countdowns with in-memory storage using Lists and Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping six main features (daily planner, Pomodoro timer, notes, flashcards, exam countdown, AI assistant) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files for the Smart Study Buddy application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Smart Study Buddy application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining six routes (dashboard, planner, timer, notes, flashcards, AI assistant) wrapped in a Layout component with type-safe router configuration.
frontend/src/components/ExamCard.tsx: Card component displaying exam name, date, and countdown with color-coded badges indicating urgency status (today, urgent, upcoming, or completed).
frontend/src/components/FlashcardList.ts: Grid layout component rendering flashcard previews with question text and truncated answer hints in hoverable cards.
Full-screen flashcard review interface with flip animation, navigation controls, progress bar, and card counter for studying flashcard decks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with responsive navigation header, mobile menu sheet, and footer; includes navigation links for Dashboard, Planner, Timer, Notes, Flashcards, and AI Helper pages.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Displays a single note in a card format with subject badge and truncated content preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIChat.ts: Custom hook providing AI chat functionality with hardcoded responses for study topics like photosynthesis, quadratic equations, World War 2, and study tips; simulates typing delay for assistant messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using @dfinity/auth-client with delegation identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on subjects, notes, flashcards, and exams, using the backend actor and localStorage as fallback for some data retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyProgress.ts: Tracks daily study progress in minutes, calculates study streaks, and persists data to localStorage with automatic daily reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimer.ts: Implements Pomodoro timer with 25-minute focus sessions and 5-minute breaks, tracking session count and updating study progress upon completion.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a soft, calming color palette for light and dark themes, including primary teal, secondary peach, and various UI element colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AIAssistant.tsx: AI chat interface page with message display, typing indicators, and input field for students to ask study-related questions to an AI assistant.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying study statistics (streak, daily hours, progress), upcoming exams, and quick action buttons with a mascot hero section.
frontend/src/pages/FlashcardsMode.tsx: Flashcard management page with dialog for creating new cards, review mode toggle, and list display of existing flashcards for quick revision.
frontend/src/pages/NotesSection.tsx: Notes management page with search functionality, dialog for creating new notes, and grouped display of notes organized by subject.
frontend/src/pages/PomodoroTimer.tsx: Pomodoro timer page with 25-minute focus sessions, 5-minute breaks, play/pause/reset controls, progress bar, and productivity tips.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlanner.tsx: React component for the Study Planner page that allows users to add/remove subjects with study times, add exams with dates, and displays a daily timetable with total study time calculation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, typography, container queries, animations, custom font sizes, shadows, and border radius variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata file documenting the Smart Study Buddy app for Class 8-12 students, listing seven implemented features including daily planner, Pomodoro timer, notes, flashcards, exam countdown, AI assistant, and progress tracking.
